Tiny Kitchen, a food show produced for Tastemade, is preparing ‚Äútiny meals‚Äù using small portions of food and similarly small kitchen implements.

Whether it‚Äôs a tiny graduation barbecue, tomato soup and a sandwich or a tiny pepperoni pizza, Tiny Kitchen produces food in a way that goes against everything we‚Äôve learned about food over the years. Bigger may not necessarily be better.

title: WATCH: The Tiniest Food Ever
